items.name: Longsword
items.description: A standard longsword with a sharp steel blade and leather-wrapped hilt.

items.name: Potion of Healing
items.description: A red magical potion that restores vitality when consumed.
items.effects: Restores 2d4+2 hit points when consumed

items.name: Ring of Protection
items.description: A finely crafted silver ring inscribed with protective runes.

items.name: +1 Shield
items.description: A sturdy wooden shield reinforced with iron bands and enchanted for protection.

items.name: Bag of Holding
items.description: This bag has an interior space considerably larger than its outside dimensions.
items.effects: Can hold up to 500 pounds, not exceeding a volume of 64 cubic feet

items.name: Flame Tongue
items.description: A magical sword that can ignite with flames at the wielder's command.

items.name: Cloak of Elvenkind
items.description: This cloak grants its wearer a +2 bonus to Dexterity (Stealth) checks.
items.effects: +2 bonus to Stealth checks

items.name: Scroll of Fireball
items.description: A magical scroll containing the fireball spell.
items.effects: Casts fireball (3rd level) when read

items.name: Plate Armor
items.description: Full plate armor made of interlocking metal plates.

items.name: Staff of Power
items.description: This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff and contains multiple magical abilities.

items.name: Frost-Cleaver Battleaxe
items.description: A heavy battleaxe made of never-melting ice. It is cold to the touch and leaves a trail of frost in the air when swung.
items.effects: Grants resistance to fire damage while held.

items.name: Mithral Half Plate
items.description: Exquisitely crafted armor made of silvery mithral. It is lighter than standard steel and allows for greater stealth.
items.effects: Does not impose disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

items.name: Phial of Volatile Magma
items.description: A glass vial containing swirling, bright orange liquid magma. It is hot to the touch.
items.effects: Can be thrown up to 30ft. Explodes on impact dealing 4d6 fire damage in a 10ft radius.

items.name: Wand of Binding
items.description: A twisted piece of driftwood wrapped in iron wire. It hums with abjuration magic.
items.effects: Allows the user to cast Hold Monster (consumes charges). Regains 1d6+1 charges at dawn.

items.name: Seeker's Shortbow
items.description: A bow carved from yew wood with an eye symbol etched into the grip.
items.effects: The wielder ignores half cover and three-quarters cover when making ranged attacks with this weapon.

items.name: Helm of Telepathy
items.description: A sleek metal helmet that covers the ears but leaves the face exposed, embedded with a small violet crystal.
items.effects: Allows the user to read thoughts and communicate telepathically.

items.name: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
items.description: Thick iron gauntlets covered in rust-colored fur.
items.effects: Your Strength score is 19 while you wear these gauntlets.

items.name: Lightning Javelin
items.description: A javelin inscribed with zigzagging runes. When thrown, it transforms into a bolt of lightning.

items.name: Shield of the Sentinel
items.description: A large tower shield emblazoned with a watching eye.
items.effects: Advantage on Initiative rolls and Perception checks.

items.name: Dust of Sneezing and Choking
items.description: A small pouch containing a fine, irritating powder.
items.effects: When cast into the air, creatures in a 10-foot radius must save or become incapacitated by fits of sneezing.

items.name: Screaming Bolts (x5)
items.description: Crossbow bolts with holes drilled in the shaft to create a high-pitched shriek when fired.
items.effects: On a hit, the target must succeed on a Constitution save or be deafened.

items.name: Ring of Mind Shielding
items.description: A ring of fine copper shaped like a snake biting its own tail.
items.effects: You are immune to magic that allows other creatures to read your thoughts or determine if you are lying.

items.name: Rod of the Pact Keeper +1
items.description: A smooth, black metal rod that feels warm to the touch.
items.effects: Grants +1 to spell attack rolls and saving throw DCs for Warlock spells. Can regain one spell slot per long rest.

items.name: Folding Boat
items.description: A small wooden box that unfolds into a boat.
items.effects: Can unfold into a 10-foot rowboat or a 24-foot ship upon speaking the command word.

items.name: Sun Blade
items.description: A sword hilt that projects a blade of pure radiance.
items.effects: Deals extra damage to undead. Emits bright light in a 15-foot radius.

items.name: Greataxe of the Void
items.description: A massive axe forged from black iron that seems to absorb the surrounding light. When swinging this weapon, the user feels a hunger emanating from the blade. Requirement: User must have a Strength score of 17 or higher to attune.
items.effects: On a critical hit, the target is banished to a pocket dimension until the end of their next turn.

items.name: Whisperwind Longbow
items.description: Crafted from hollowed Ash wood, arrows fired from this bow make absolutely no sound. Requirement: Proficiency in Stealth required to utilize the silence feature.
items.effects: Attacks made while hidden do not reveal the attacker's position unless the attack misses by 5 or more.

items.name: Carapace of the Iron Beetle
items.description: Plate armor crafted from the chitins of a subterranean behemoth. It is incredibly heavy and dense. Requirement: Wearer must have Heavy Armor proficiency. Movement speed is reduced by 5ft while worn.
items.effects: Grant resistance to non-magical Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage. The wearer cannot be knocked prone.

items.name: Shadowstep Leather
items.description: Dark leather armor that seems to blur at the edges. Requirement: Must be worn by a rogue, ranger, or bard.
items.effects: As a bonus action, the wearer can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space they can see that is in dim light or darkness (3 charges/day).

items.name: Aegis of the Sun
items.description: A golden circular shield that is warm to the touch. Requirement: Must be a follower of a deity of light or life.
items.effects: Sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius. Once per day, use a reaction to blind an attacker who hits you with a melee attack.

items.name: Draught of the Phoenix
items.description: A swirling orange liquid that glows with intense heat. The bottle feels like it might melt.
items.effects: Upon consumption, the user gains resistance to Fire damage for 1 hour. If the user drops to 0 HP within that hour, they immediately explode in fire (3d6 damage to adjacent enemies) and regain 20 HP.

items.name: Fulminating Pike
items.description: A long spear tipped with electrum. Static electricity crackles when it strikes metal.
items.effects: This weapon has the Thrown property (range 20/60). It immediately returns to the wielder's hand after being thrown.

items.name: Ring of Temporal Flux
items.description: A band of shifting quicksilver that never sits comfortably on the finger.
items.effects: Once per long rest, the wearer can reroll a failed saving throw. Additionally, they are immune to the Slow spell.

items.name: Staff of Withered Roots
items.description: A gnarled staff made of petrified wood, smelling faintly of grave dirt. Requirement: Spellcaster class.
items.effects: Allows the caster to cast Blight or Speak with Dead once per day without expending a spell slot.

items.name: Scepter of the Tides
items.description: A rod made of blue coral. You can hear the ocean if you hold it to your ear. Requirement: Must speak Aquan.
items.effects: The wielder can breathe underwater and has a swimming speed of 60ft. Can cast Control Water at will.

items.name: Cube of Force Containment
items.description: A small metallic cube with complex gears. When thrown, it expands into a cage of pure force.
items.effects: As an action, throw at a Large or smaller creature. Target must succeed on DC 15 DEX save or be restrained in a force cage for 1 minute.

items.name: Phase-Shift Bolts (x5)
items.description: Crossbow bolts etched with runes of transmutation. They shimmer and disappear periodically.
items.effects: These bolts ignore half and three-quarters cover. They ignore the AC bonus from shields.

items.name: Clockwork Steed
items.description: A mechanical horse constructed of brass and iron. It requires no food, but needs oiling. Requirement: Proficiency in Tinker's Tools to repair.
items.effects: Movement speed 60ft. Immune to exhaustion and poison. Can carry up to 1000 lbs.

items.name: Master Thief's Skeleton Key
items.description: A bone-white key that morphs its shape to fit any keyhole. Requirement: Proficiency in Thieves' Tools.
items.effects: Grants advantage on all checks to pick locks. Can open a magical lock (like Arcane Lock) with a DC 25 check.

items.name: Scroll of Mass Teleport
items.description: A shimmering parchment that feels as if it is vibrating. The words hurt to look at directly.
items.effects: Teleports up to 10 willing creatures to a known teleportation circle on the same plane of existence. The scroll is consumed on use.
